survey.title: Testing your understanding of video elements

questions.name: vet1
questions.title: Which of the following is the correct definition for: Quality of the video imagery?
choices: (A) It means how much the visual in a video stutters.
(B) It means how perfectly the visual in the video matches with the sound.
(C) It means whether the audio sounds choppy or fluent.
(D) This refers to how clear or crisp the visual is in the video.
(E) This refers to how clear or crisp the audio sounds.

questions.name: vet2
questions.title: Which of the following is the correct definition for: Quality of the audio?
choices: (A) It means how much the visual in a video stutters.
(B) It means how perfectly the visual in the video matches with the sound.
(C) It means whether the audio sounds choppy or fluent.
(D) This refers to how clear or crisp the visual is in the video.
(E) This refers to how clear or crisp the audio sounds.

questions.name: vet3
questions.title: Which of the following is the correct definition for: Stability of the video imagery?
choices: (A) It means how much the visual in a video stutters.
(B) It means how perfectly the visual in the video matches with the sound.
(C) It means whether the audio sounds choppy or fluent.
(D) This refers to how clear or crisp the visual is in the video.
(E) This refers to how clear or crisp the audio sounds.

questions.name: vet4
questions.title: Which of the following is the correct definition for: Stability of the audio?
choices: (A) It means how much the visual in a video stutters.
(B) It means how perfectly the visual in the video matches with the sound.
(C) It means whether the audio sounds choppy or fluent.
(D) This refers to how clear or crisp the visual is in the video.
(E) This refers to how clear or crisp the audio sounds.

questions.name: vet5
questions.title: Which of the following is the correct definition for: Synchronization between the video imagery and the audio?
choices: (A) It means how much the visual in a video stutters.
(B) It means how perfectly the visual in the video matches with the sound.
(C) It means whether the audio sounds choppy or fluent.
(D) This refers to how clear or crisp the visual is in the video.
(E) This refers to how clear or crisp the audio sounds.

questions.name: vet6
questions.title: What is the object that fell and hit the butterfly in the example videos?
choices: (1) A Banana
(2) A Stone
(3) An Apple
(4) A Flower
